title: Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
statement: Design an algorithm to serialize a binary tree to a string and deserialize the string back to the original tree structure. The output should prove round-trip correctness by printing the tree's level order traversal after deserialization.
input_format:
First line contains N (number of nodes including nulls in level order).
Second line contains N space-separated integers (-1 for null).
output_format: Print the level order traversal of deserialized tree (same format as input, with -1 for nulls).
